Reviews.Title: love my evo!
Reviews.Author: debaum2
Reviews.Content: I love my evo shift! Its one of the best phones I ever got. The coolest thing about it is the slide out keyboard. I have nails, and its hard for me to type with the touch screen. Plus, my husband has fat fingers and he uses the keyboard much easier! I love this phone and ill be staying with HTC!

Reviews.Title: Replacement phone
Reviews.Author: Jim Haldeman
Reviews.Content: My mother needed a replacement phone. Although I ordered this phone for her used, it would have been better served to be scrapped instead of being put back on the market for use. I've always liked sliding keyboards, but this one moves a bit roughly. You could definitely tell it was not reconditioned. I'm sure it was a trade-in that was purchased by the dealer and just moved from on box into another to be pushed out again without any attention to details. It was also missing the charger cord. I will not be using this group again.

Reviews.Title: so far so good

Reviews.Content: my daughter likes the phone thus far.  lets see how it goes from here.  i have a wait and see approach with items i have never used before.
